code:
# Scrum Sprint Diagrams ## Sprint Cycle ```mermaid graph TD PB[Product Backlog] --> SP[Sprint Planning] SP --> SB[Sprint Backlog] SB --> Daily[Daily Scrum] Daily --> |Every Day| Daily Daily --> Review[Sprint Review] Review --> Retro[Sprint Retrospective] Retro --> PB style Daily fill:#90EE90 ``` ## Sprint Timeline ```mermaid gantt title Sprint 15 (2 Weeks) dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD section Ceremonies Sprint Planning :done, plan, 2025-07-07, 4h Daily Standups :active, daily, after plan, 10d Sprint Review :review, 2025-07-18, 2h Sprint Retrospective :retro, after review, 2h section Development Story 1 (5 pts) :done, s1, 2025-07-08, 3d Story 2 (3 pts) :active, s2, after s1, 2d Story 3 (8 pts) :s3, 2025-07-10, 5d Story 4 (5 pts) :s4, after s2, 3d ``` ## Burndown Chart Concept ```mermaid graph TD subgraph "Sprint Burndown" A[40 pts] -->|Day 1| B[38 pts] B -->|Day 2| C[35 pts] C -->|Day 3| D[32 pts] D -->|Day 4| E[28 pts] E -->|Day 5| F[24 pts - Current] F -.->|Projected| G[20 pts] G -.->|Day 10| H[0 pts] end style F fill:#90EE90 ``` ## Team Velocity ```mermaid graph LR subgraph "Velocity Trend" S1[Sprint 1
32 pts] --> S2[Sprint 2
38 pts] S2 --> S3[Sprint 3
35 pts] S3 --> S4[Sprint 4
40 pts] S4 --> S5[Sprint 5
37 pts - Avg] end style S5 fill:#FFE4B5 ```
